column4: When inserting removable media (CD, DVD), a window pops up offering to use a list of applications. How do I add and app to that list?
some of these options are configurable via nautilus > edit > preferences i believe
Thank you. Looking in the "Media" tab I see a drop down for the (common) media types, but no way to add to the (empty) lists of apps
personally using xubuntu, hence i'm not sure on how to proceed .. there's gnome-volume-manager though, that might already be installed on your system ..
